1.name: First House
1.description: Represents the self, physical appearance, first impressions, and how one instinctively approaches life. The sign on the 1st house cusp is the Ascendant (rising sign) and colors a person's overall style, energy, and way of initiating action.

2.name: Second House
2.description: Relates to personal finances, material possessions, and the way one earns and manages resources. Also describes one's sense of self-worth, security, and what is considered valuable or worth investing in.

3.name: Third House
3.description: Covers thinking style, everyday communication, and information exchange. Connected to siblings, neighbors, local environment, early education, and short-distance travel.

4.name: Fourth House
4.description: Represents home life, family, roots, ancestry, and emotional foundations. Indicates one's need for safety and privacy, relationship to parents, and the sense of belonging.

5.name: Fifth House
5.description: Concerns joy, play, romance, hobbies, artistic expression, and children. Shows how a person seeks pleasure, takes creative risks, and shines in a playful or romantic way.

6.name: Sixth House
6.description: Rules daily work, service to others, routines, and practical skills. Connected to physical health, lifestyle, diet, and organization in everyday life.

7.name: Seventh House
7.description: Describes committed partnerships of all kinds: romantic, business, and legal. Indicates how one relates to significant others, seeks balance, and mirrors themselves through close relationships.

8.name: Eighth House
8.description: Relates to deep bonding, psychological transformation, sexuality, and shared resources such as joint finances, inheritances, and debts. Connected to loss, regeneration, and confronting taboos.

9.name: Ninth House
9.description: Covers higher education, philosophy, spirituality, law, and long-distance travel. Represents the search for meaning, broader perspectives, and experiences that expand horizons.

10.name: Tenth House
10.description: Represents vocation, public role, reputation, and long-term ambitions. Shows how one appears in the public eye, interacts with authority, and pursues recognition and mastery.

11.name: Eleventh House
11.description: Relates to friendships, communities, social networks, and collective causes. Describes future-oriented goals, hopes, and broader contributions to society.

12.name: Twelfth House
12.description: Connects with the unconscious, dreams, retreat, and hidden aspects of life. Linked to endings, release, spiritual practices, isolation, and deep healing.

sun.name: Sun
sun.description: The Sun represents core identity, willpower, and the central storyline of a life. Its sign shows how a person expresses their essence, while the house shows where this energy radiates most strongly.

moon.name: Moon
moon.description: The Moon represents emotional nature, instinctive reactions, and what feels safe. Its sign shows how a person feels and self-soothes, while the house points to where deep needs are most active.

ascendant.name: Ascendant
ascendant.description: The Ascendant is the sign rising on the eastern horizon at birth. It shapes the house system and describes how a person approaches situations and appears to others.

sun.name: Sun
sun.description: Symbolizes core self, ego, and creative life force. Shows how a person shines and seeks purpose.

moon.name: Moon
moon.description: Represents emotional landscape, intuition, and instinctive patterns.

mercury.name: Mercury
mercury.description: Rules the mind, language, and information exchange. Describes thinking style and communication.

venus.name: Venus
venus.description: Governs attraction, affection, aesthetics, and personal values.

mars.name: Mars
mars.description: Represents raw energy, desire, and how a person acts and defends themselves.

saturn.name: Saturn
saturn.description: Represents boundaries, effort, and long-term mastery.

uranus.name: Uranus
uranus.description: Embodies sudden change, originality, and freedom.

neptune.name: Neptune
neptune.description: Relates to dreams, ideals, and spiritual sensitivity.

pluto.name: Pluto
pluto.description: Symbolizes deep transformation and psychological intensity.

sun.description: Sun in Aries expresses as bold, energetic, and pioneering.

moon.description: Moon in Aries feels intensely and seeks quick, honest emotional expression.

ascendant.description: Aries rising appears bold, direct, and energetic.

sun.description: Sun in Taurus values stability, comfort, and tangible results.

moon.description: Moon in Taurus needs reliability, comfort, and calm surroundings.

ascendant.description: Taurus rising appears grounded, steady, and unhurried.

sun.description: Sun in Gemini thrives on ideas, conversation, and variety.

moon.description: Moon in Gemini needs communication and mental engagement.

ascendant.description: Gemini rising appears quick, curious, and social.

sun.description: Sun in Cancer expresses emotional sensitivity and devotion to home.

moon.description: Moon in Cancer forms deep attachments and responds instinctively.

ascendant.description: Cancer rising appears caring, sensitive, and quietly protective.

sun.description: Sun in Leo seeks recognition, creativity, and heartfelt expression.

moon.description: Moon in Leo seeks warmth, loyalty, and emotional validation. This placement expresses feelings dramatically and craves genuine appreciation from close connections.

ascendant.description: Leo rising appears warm, expressive, and noticeable. Others experience an aura of confidence, creativity, and generous presence.

sun.description: Sun in Virgo expresses through precision, improvement, and service.

moon.description: Moon in Virgo feels secure through routines, clarity, and usefulness.

ascendant.description: Virgo rising appears attentive, orderly, and subtly analytical.

sun.description: Sun in Libra seeks balance, beauty, and meaningful partnerships.

moon.description: Moon in Libra feels safe in balanced, aesthetically pleasing environments.

ascendant.description: Libra rising appears kind, fair, and socially refined.

sun.description: Sun in Scorpio expresses depth, emotional power, and persistence.

moon.description: Moon in Scorpio feels profoundly and seeks emotional truth.

ascendant.description: Scorpio rising appears magnetic, private, and observant.

sun.description: Sun in Sagittarius seeks growth, adventure, and wisdom.

moon.description: Moon in Sagittarius needs space, honesty, and inspiration.

ascendant.description: Sagittarius rising appears expansive, curious, and spirited.

sun.description: Sun in Capricorn focuses on structure, goals, and long-term success.

moon.description: Moon in Capricorn feels safe when in control and managing duties well.

ascendant.description: Capricorn rising appears focused, composed, and self-disciplined.

sun.description: Sun in Aquarius expresses originality, intellect, and future-oriented vision.

moon.description: Moon in Aquarius seeks independence and intellectual connection.

ascendant.description: Aquarius rising appears original, inventive, and socially aware.

sun.description: Sun in Pisces expresses compassion, fluidity, and creativity.

moon.description: Moon in Pisces feels deeply and senses subtle emotional undercurrents.

ascendant.description: Pisces rising appears dreamy, empathetic, and intuitive.
